text: Agek, kɨli abe nop pen agɨnɨgabal, Bɨawl, ñɨn akal nep yuwan gek tap mɨdup ma ñɨbun agɨnɨgabal agak? Ñɨn akal ñɨg nen gek nep ñɨg ma ñɨbun agɨnɨgabal agak? Ñɨn akal pal okok nɨb ape, nep ma agdɨpun agɨnɨgabal agak? Ñɨn akal chech ma yek, nep ma ñɨbun agɨnɨgabal agak? Ñɨn akal tap gek akaŋ, nep nag lel mɨdenak, nep ma amɨl nɨŋɨd dɨtep gɨpun agɨnɨgabal agak?
